org.wso2.carbon.identity.openidconnect.dao

Interface ScopeClaimMappingDAO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CacheBackedScopeClaimMappingDAOImpl, ScopeClaimMappingDAOImpl

    public interface ScopeClaimMappingDAO
    Interface used in openid connect to handle all the scope claim mapping related db operations.

    • Method Summary

      • addScopes

        void addScopes(int tenantId,
               List<ScopeDTO> scopeClaimsMap)
        throws IdentityOAuth2Exception
        To add OIDC scopes and claims in the related db tables.
        Parameters:
        tenantId - tenant Id
        scopeClaimsMap - map of oidc scope claims
        Throws:
        IdentityOAuth2Exception - if an error occurs when inserting scopes or claims.

        Parameters:

        scope - scope
        Throws:
        IdentityOAuth2Exception - if an error occurs when adding a scope.

      • getScopes

        List<ScopeDTO> getScopes(int tenantId)
                  throws IdentityOAuth2Exception
        To retrieve all persisted oidc scopes with mapped claims.
        Parameters:
        tenantId - tenant Id
        Returns:
        all persisted scopes and claims
        Throws:
        IdentityOAuth2Exception - if an error occurs when loading scopes and claims.

        List<String> getScopeNames(int tenantId)
                    throws IdentityOAuth2Exception
        To retrieve all persisted oidc scopes.
        Parameters:
        tenantId - tenant Id
        Returns:
        list of scopes persisted.
        Throws:
        IdentityOAuth2Exception - if an error occurs when loading oidc scopes.

                 int tenantId)
          throws IdentityOAuth2Exception
        To remove persisted scopes and claims.
        Parameters:
        scope - oidc scope
        Throws:
        IdentityOAuthAdminException - if an error occurs when deleting scopes and claims.

      • updateScope

        void updateScope(String scope,
                 int tenantId,
                 List<String> addClaims,
                 List<String> deleteClaims)
          throws IdentityOAuth2Exception
        To add new claims for an existing scope.
        Parameters:
        scope - scope name
        tenantId - tenant Id
        addClaims - list of oidc claims to be added
        deleteClaims - list of oidc claims to be deleted
        Throws:
        IdentityOAuth2Exception - if an error occurs when adding a new claim for a scope.

      • getClaims

        ScopeDTO getClaims(String scope,
                   int tenantId)
            throws IdentityOAuth2Exception
        To retrieve oidc claims mapped to an oidc scope.
        Parameters:
        scope - scope
        tenantId - tenant Id
        Returns:
        list of claims which are mapped to the oidc scope.
        Throws:
        IdentityOAuth2Exception - if an error occurs when lading oidc claims.

        To load top record of the scope table.
        Returns:
        scope id
        Throws:
        IdentityOAuth2Exception - if an error occurs when loading the top scope record.

              throws IdentityOAuth2Exception
        To check whether the scope is existing.

        tenantId - tenant id
